title: Stranger Things - The Upside Down
description: Test your knowledge about Hawkins and its supernatural mysteries. Moderate spoilers included.

questions.question: In which fictional town does Stranger Things take place?
questions.explanation: Hawkins, Indiana is the small town where supernatural events unfold throughout the series.

questions.question: What is Eleven's favorite food?
questions.explanation: Eleven loves Eggo waffles, which become an iconic element of her character.

questions.question: What game do the kids frequently play?
questions.explanation: Dungeons & Dragons is central to the group's friendship and often mirrors the plot.

questions.question: What year does Season 1 take place?
questions.explanation: Season 1 is set in November 1983, during the height of the Cold War era.

questions.question: Who plays Chief Jim Hopper?
questions.explanation: David Harbour portrays the troubled but heroic police chief Jim Hopper.

questions.question: What is the parallel dimension called?
questions.explanation: The Upside Down is the dark, decaying parallel dimension that threatens Hawkins.

questions.question: Which company runs the secret lab?
questions.explanation: Hawkins National Laboratory is the secretive government facility conducting experiments.

questions.question: What is the name of the monster in Season 1?
questions.explanation: The Demogorgon, named after a D&D creature, is the predatory monster from the Upside Down.

questions.question: Which actress plays Eleven?
questions.explanation: Millie Bobby Brown's breakout role as Eleven made her a global star.

questions.question: What mall opens in Season 3?
questions.explanation: Starcourt Mall becomes a major setting in Season 3, with a secret Russian base beneath it.
